name: @zthun/works.apps
description: A zthunworks microservice that manages the available applications in the zthunworks system.
author: Anthony Bonta

scripts.docker:publish: docker push zthun/works.apps:latest && docker push zthun/works.apps:$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
scripts.docker:build: npm pack && docker build . -t zthun/works.apps:latest -t zthun/works.apps:$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
